text: The Silent Partner or Vitaphone 1250–51: The Silent Partner is a 1931 American short drama black and white film directed by Roy Mack and starring William Gaxton. It is produced by The Vitaphone Corporation. == Cast == * William Gaxton as Bill, the Nephew == References == == External links == * Category:American short films Category:1931 short films Category:American drama films Category:1931 drama films Category:1931 films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Roy Mack Category:Films produced by Samuel Sax Category:Films with screenplays by Rupert Hughes Category:Vitaphone short films Category:Films shot in New York City Category:American films
title: The Silent Partner (1931 film)
